Sentry Mode activated - Check your vehic: Sentry Mode activated - Check your vehicle!
Your account is linked and active!: Your account is linked and active!
Your SentryGuard account has been linked: Your SentryGuard account has been linked successfully!
By signing or accepting this form, you c: By signing or accepting this form, you consent to the processing of your Personal Data by SentryGuardOrg ("Partner") in the context of the Partner's application titled SentryGuard (the "App").
Partner is the data controller responsib: Partner is the data controller responsible for the processing of your Personal Data in the context of the App.
By signing or accepting this form, you a: By signing or accepting this form, you also acknowledge receipt of the Tesla Customer Privacy Notice available at
(\"Tesla Privacy Notice\") and consent t: ("Tesla Privacy Notice") and consent to processing of Personal Data by Tesla in accordance with the Tesla Privacy Notice.
The App allows you to benefit from advan: The App allows you to benefit from advanced monitoring and notification features based on your Tesla vehicle's Sentry Mode, including the identification and logging of security events (e.g., event detection, Sentry Mode alerts).
Partner does not access or process other: Partner does not access or process other categories of data from your vehicle (e.g., remote commands, detailed driving data, battery or precise location information), beyond what is strictly necessary for the App to function as described above.
Partner maintains administrative, techni: Partner maintains administrative, technical, and physical safeguards designed to protect Personal Data against accidental, unlawful or unauthorized destruction, loss, alteration, access, disclosure or use, including encryption of data in transit and, where appropriate, at rest. Partner will only retain your Personal Data for as long as necessary to provide you with the App and the features described above, unless otherwise required or authorized by applicable law or if you request early deletion.
Subject to applicable law (including GDP:
Subject to applicable law (including GDPR), you may have the right to request access and receive information about your Personal Data, update and correct inaccuracies, and request deletion when legal conditions are met. You also have the right to withdraw your consent at any time, without cost, which may however limit or prevent use of the App.

To exercise your rights, withdraw your consent or obtain more information about the App and the processing of your Personal Data, you can contact Partner at: abarghoud@gmail.com.
I consent to the collection, use, and pr: I consent to the collection, use, and processing of my Personal Data as described above.

welcomeEmailSubject: Your SentryGuard access has been approved!
welcomeEmailBody:
Your account has been approved!

Hello {{name}},


Great news! Your SentryGuard account has been approved.
You can now log in and start monitoring your Tesla vehicle's Sentry Mode in real-time.


ðŸš€ Getting Started

Step 1: Configure Telegram
Link your Telegram account to receive instant Sentry Mode alerts.
Step 2: Approve Virtual Key
Authorize the virtual key in your Tesla app to enable remote monitoring.
Step 3: Enable Telemetry
Activate telemetry streaming to start receiving real-time Sentry Mode events.
Access your dashboard at: sentryguard.org


Thank you for your patience and your interest in SentryGuard!


The SentryGuard Team
